title: Elliston 13-year-old in stable condition after being accidentally shot
content:
MONTGOMERY COUNTY (WSLS 10) – A 13-year-old is in stable condition Friday after being shot in Elliston Thanksgiving Day.
It happened in the 5100 block of Duke lane. The Montgomery County Sheriff’s Office said the shooting incident was accidental.
A call for help came to 911 dispatchers in around 3 p.m. for a 13-year-old boy who was accidentally shot. He was airlifted to Roanoke Memorial Hospital. Information about who shot him was not being released.
The Montgomery County Sheriffs Office was investigating this incident.
